page.title: 10Houses in Clayton-le-Woods
page.content:
On the estate on which I live most of the{houses}are semi-detached, but there is still one farm house. On the main road the houses and bungalows were built earlier, are all different designs and are more expensive to buy. Most of the houses on the new estates are privately owned and are a mixture of detached, semi-detached, terraced houses and bungalows. There is also a small development of houses - semi-detached, detached and some two story flats - for rent.
At Clayton Green there are some much older houses, some of which were {handloom weavers}cottages. One was the {toll house}on the turnpike which is now the A6 road.
